message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. It's a one-of-a-kind item that I think you'll really love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $150.
Thanks for the offer, Alice! I really appreciate it. However, $150 is a bit more than I'm comfortable spending. I'd be willing to pay $100 for it. What do you think?
Thank you for your offer, Bob! I understand that $150 might be a bit steep for you. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $125. What do you think?
Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. $125 is still a bit too high for my budget.  I'm firm on $100. If you're not willing to go lower, I'll have to look elsewhere.
I understand your position, Bob, and I'm willing to make one more concession. I can offer it to you for $120. That's as low as I'm willing to go. What do you think?
